Articles.Content: So Medieval Engineers was recently announced by Keen Software House, the creators of Space Engineers. It is being developed by a new set of people that were hired though, so SE should not be effected. I'm looking forward to it because A. I can build my own giant castle/Fortress and B. You can build mobile siege weapons, so I am excited to build massive siege towers and maybe even mobile forts.

Testing to see if I'm banned from posting

I too am looking forward to that game, as I am a lover of ancient and medieval history. I just got into space engineers myself.

I posted a rant not too long ago about it.

*grabs knife* The sheer mention of it makes me want to kill kittens.
The destruction looks cool. Only if multiplayer works though.

*grabs knife* The sheer mention of it makes me want to kill kittens.

NO!!!!!!!!!!!!!! JUST NO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! IT IS A GOOD IDEA!!!!!!!!!!! (also kittens are cute and fluffy and are a protected species (seriously they are) and ME might be the same game as SE so that you can land on old ME worlds in SE

NO!!!!!!!!!!!!!! JUST NO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! IT IS A GOOD IDEA!!!!!!!!!!! (also kittens are cute and fluffy and are a protected species (seriously they are) and ME might be the same game as SE so that you can land on old ME worlds in SE

It's not. Please don't be a fanboy. The developer has a bad reputation for dropping games during development just to make new games, like they dropped and killed minee wars in favor of space engineers.

Plus, kittens are just cats, and we have more than enough of them, so many of them need to live on the street.

I guess I should clear this up: it was said that ME is being worked on by a new team of people that were hired and as such ME should not negatively effect SE. Quote from the Rock, Paper, Shotgun article about ME's announcement: "Medieval Engineers shouldnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t affect ongoing work on Space Engineers, Keen Software founder Marek Rosa has said in a blog post. He explains that theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve hired new folks, and are actually planning to bring bits from Medieval over to Space."
Should mean that we finally will be able to mount Trebuchets on top of our space stations /ships in space engineers?

I posted a rant not too long ago about it.

*grabs knife* The sheer mention of it makes me want to kill kittens.

Please do not kill kittens. The kittens are your friend. They are sad; for you want to kill them when they have done nothing wrong. The happy fun kittens wish you to exist in a realm of eternal fluffy-fuzziness where all hate is forgotten.

Do Not Tempt the Happy Fun Kitten.
